package.name: comet.data
package.shortDescription: The comet.data package contains the classes and the interfaces that represent data structures.
package.description: The comet.data package contains the classes and the interfaces that represent data structures.

package.name: comet.data.score.loaders
package.shortDescription: The comet.data.score.loaders package contains the classes and the interfaces to load score data from text.
package.description: The comet.data.score.loaders package contains the classes and the interfaces to load score data from text.

package.name: comet.events
package.shortDescription: The comet.events package contains the event classes.
package.description: The comet.events package contains the event classes.

package.name: comet.game.lanes
